question: Is Finno free to use?
answer: Yes, Finno is completely free to use.

question: How does Finno keep my data secure?
answer: Finno uses industry-standard encryption to keep your data secure. All data is encrypted in transit and at rest.

question: Can I connect my bank account to Finno?
answer: Yes, you can connect your bank account to Finno for seamless tracking of your expenses and income.

question: Can I use Finno to track my investments?
answer: Yes, Finno allows you to track your investments and monitor their performance.

question: Can I export my data from Finno?
answer: Yes, you can export your data from Finno in CSV format.

question: How can I get support for Finno?
answer: You can get support for Finno by visiting our Help Center or by contacting our support team directly.
